title: Put A Chief Under Your Tree

posts.post_title: Put A Chief Under Your Tree
posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10162/meyers-portrait[/IMG]

The Chief is for sale.
The Chief is well-centered.
The Chief has a well registered image.
The Chief is graded fairly.
The Chief has a Piedmont 350-460 back.
The Chief is not Piedmont Fact 42s

Arlie Latham is $OLD
Chief Meyers Portrait is $OLD


What more could you want

Three day bump with enticing price revision.;)

Remember to buy the card, not the holder.

Two week bump.

The cards are just as beautiful now as when they were listed.

You weren't early enough for Arlie.

Don't be too late for the "Chief"
